net.nightwhistler.htmlspanner.handlers

Class PreHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.nightwhistler.htmlspanner.TagNodeHandler
      • net.nightwhistler.htmlspanner.handlers.PreHandler

  • public class PreHandler
extends TagNodeHandler
    Handles pre tags, setting the style to monospace and preserving the formatting.

      • rendersContent

        public boolean rendersContent()
        Description copied from class: TagNodeHandler
        If this TagNodeHandler takes care of rendering the content. If true, the parser will not add the content itself.
